thread.title: Courtney Wood had NO IDEA Jessica Cunningham was doing Celebrity Big Brother
thread.title_full: Courtney Wood had NO IDEA Jessica Cunningham was doing Celebrity Big Brother

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Courtney Wood had NO IDEA Jessica Cunningham was doing Celebrity Big Brother
text:
Courtney Wood had NO IDEA Jessica Cunningham was doing Celebrity Big Brother The Apprentice star has been flirting with Calum Best in the house Share Courtney Wood and Jess Cunningham Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Jessica Cunningham has been flirting outrageously with Calum Best in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
But that’s the least of her love interest Courtney Wood’s worries. 
You see, The Apprentice finalist has revealed that he had NO idea she was even going in the house. Read More Celebrity Big Brother bosses plan 'Summer Legends' show and are splashing the cash to bag Katie Price and Chantelle Houghton Jessica Cunningham getting a massage from Calum Best on Celebrity Big Brother (Photo: Rex Features) 
Courtney, 30, has admitted that Jessica, 29, isn’t his official girlfriend but that the pair are dating. 
“She only found out 24 hours before. It was all very last minute,” he told new! magazine . 
“She was meant to be coming to London on Friday to see me but she messaged me that morning, telling me to call her agent.” Read More Jessica Cunningham has been flirting with Calum Best (Photo: Channel 5) 
But after talking to Jessica’s agent, Courtney insists he wasn’t upset. 
“I understand it. The money will set her kids up for life. I would never get in the way of her doing that,” he said. 
And despite Jessica’s constant flirting with her housemate Calum, he insists he doesn’t feel “mugged off” and is comfortable with her flirty ways. Courtney Wood insists he's not being a 'mug' (Photo: Twitter/Courtney Wood) 
“Kissing someone will be over the line. There’s one thing I’m not, and that’s a mug," he said. 
“If she’s constantly trying to get with him, that’s it for me. I won’t be on any more dates with that girl.” 
Last night, Jessica gave Calum a steamy massage . The Apprentice’s Jessica Cunningham and Courtney Wood 
The former Apprentice candidate treated Calum to a rub down on Monday night’s episode, suggesting she’s forgiven him for THAT row earlier this week. 
Jessica gave Calum a kiss on the cheek as she massaged him, joking: “I’m getting all nervous and hot massaging you, Calum!” 
He made several approving noises, leading Jessica to put on a sexy voice and quip: “Oh yeah, does that feel real good? Like us on Facebook
